meanings.definition: Giving a sense of happy satisfaction or enjoyment.
meanings.sent1: The flowers in the garden were the pleasantest sight.
meanings.sent2: The picnic by the lake was the pleasantest experience.
meanings.sent3: The cat found the sunny spot on the window sill to be the pleasantest napping spot.
meanings.sent4: The laughter of children playing outside was the pleasantest melody to her ears.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh cookies baking in the oven was the pleasantest aroma in the house.

meanings.sent1: The beach on a warm day is the pleasantest place to relax.
meanings.sent2: The movie they watched together was the pleasantest they had seen in a long time.
meanings.sent3: The ice cream shop had the pleasantest selection of flavors.
meanings.sent4: The sunset over the ocean was the pleasantest painting nature could create.
meanings.sent5: The feeling of sand between her toes was the pleasantest sensation she could imagine.
